data.title: Nationals Philanthropies
data.text:
Display your Natitude around town

Signal to your fellow commuters that a champion is at the wheel of your vehicle. Drivers in the District of Columbia, Maryland, and Virginia can apply for a customized license plate featuring the Curly W. Instructions below for how to apply for a customized plate. Each license plate supports the community enhancement work of Washington Nationals Philanthropies. If you have any questions, please contact us at Licenseplates@nationals.com. Please drive responsibly.

DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA DRIVERS

Washington Nationals District of Columbia license plates are available now at these D.C. DMV Service Centers: Penn Branch, Southwest, and Rhode Island.

You must bring the following to the DMV location to obtain organizational tags:

Valid Identification of the Registered Owner(s)

Existing Vehicle Tags

In addition to the regular registration fee, there is also an organizational application tag fee of $100. If you plan to display the organizational tags on your vehicle, you must surrender both your current vehicle tags and registration card and pay the additional organizational application tag fee. If you do not surrender your existing tags, you will be liable for any tickets that are received by the tag.

MARYLAND DRIVERS

Please click on the button below for the Washington Nationals License Plate Application & Instructions. Organization plates cannot be processed on vehicles classified as historic. Organization plates will not be forwarded if there is a forwarding order on the address listed on the application.

Email us at philanthropies@nationals.com for the PDF MD application.

VIRGINIA DRIVERS

Nationals license plate applications are available at Virginia DMV locations and on the Virginia DMV website.
